plan.reasoning: The ticket requires a structural redesign of the Run Monitor information architecture and interaction model (not backend/API changes), with strict UX behavior requirements around readability, progressive disclosure, responsiveness, accessibility, and jitter-free incremental updates.

steps.task: Define the exact IA layout and responsive behavior for the new Run Monitor: top run header strip, phase progress bar, main split (timeline + active step/decision context), and secondary artifacts/logs treatment with mobile accordion/drawer behavior.

Implement the IA and behavior changes in monitor/public/index.html, monitor/public/styles.css, and monitor/public/app.js while keeping monitor/server.mjs contracts unchanged; add summary-first timeline rows with payload toggles, load-more behavior, active step/next-action derivation, pause-live-updates + manual sync, and incremental DOM patching with state/scroll/focus preservation.
Create artifacts/handoff/dev-to-qa.md documenting IA decisions, incremental update strategy, preserved UI state rules, and explicit verification notes on jitter reduction approach.

Run UI/behavior regression and acceptance validation for project/run selection, refresh and auto-refresh, logs tab switching, event/plan loading, accessibility keyboard reachability, and responsive checks at 390x844; explicitly report whether jitter is resolved and what was measured.
